column2: This character, although not appearing to age, can still be killed by earthly actions.
This character is known for not dieing from either sword or disease, which gives the person some reputation amongst its peers.
This character is a living demi-god with unmeasurable potential, will this person use this power for good or for evil?
Immortality is something lusted by many, you have the exclusive opportunity of becoming one yourself, plus, you can choose three different kinds of immortalities!
Sometimes immortality itself can become a burden, you can choose to give up this wonderful gift and become mortal again.
You can use this menu to show additional settings regarding Immortality.
[From.GetTitledFirstName], you have been given three flavors of immortality, choose wisely.
[From.GetTitledFirstName], there are occasions where being immortal is a burden, you have the choice to end it and become mortal again, prone to the malices of age.
With this menu you can select any of the given option to open the appropriate sub-menu.
On second thought, I don't want to become immortal.
On second thought, I'll stick to being immortal for a bit longer.
I don't wish to change anything at the moment.
With this menu you select if you want to focus on your children or your spouse.
I don't wish to change anything at the moment.
With this menu you can choose to make your heir immortal or not.
With this menu you can make your children immortal or not.
I don't wish to change anything at the moment.
I don't wish to change anything at the moment.
With this menu you can make your spouse immortal or not.
